page.title: 10A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: {A TYPICAL DAY IN A WINKLEIGH FAMILY {(1985) RISE,WASH,DRESS BREAKFAST:FRUIT JUICE,CEREAL,TOAST WITH JAM OR MARMALADE,TEA OR COFFEE TO DRINK. CLEAN TEETH,FAMILY TO WORK OR SCHOOL 8-9A.M. HOUSEWORK:VACUUM CARPETS,POLISH FURNITURE,CLEAN BATHROOM, MAKE BEDS, WASH CLOTHING, LUNCH: SALAD SANDWICHES CAKE, FRUIT,POTATO CRIPS,ORANGE OR LEMON SQUASH. CHILDREN RETURN 4-5P.M. HAVE DRINK AND BISCUIT. CHILDREN PLAY, WATCH TELEVISION, HOMEWORK. EVENING MEAL 5-6P.M. BEEF PIE, CARROTS POTATOES,PEAS(FROM FREEZER), TINNED FRUITAND ICE CREAM. DRINK TEA OR COFFEE.
